/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. Cars and motorcycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape.
